# quarterly

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of quarterly is to make working with year-quarter data easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of quarterly like so:

``` {r eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("SFOEWD/quarterly")
```

## Examples

```{r example}
library(quarterly)
q1 <- qtr(20204, origin = "calendar")

q1 + 1
q1 - 1
q1 - 4

qtr_start(q1)
qtr_end(q1)

q2 <- qtr(20214)

q2 - q1
```
